title: Trump on a whole new level v2

replies.body:
And this guy is running for president...
Sorry America, but you are without a doubt stuffed.

replies.body:
I mean, he's not 100% wrong... 

More like 75%.

While yes, Obama is not the ACTUAL founder, the US gave rebels in the Middle East weapons to fight terrorism.

Which led to the creation of ISIS.

The president before Obama (brainfart oops) was the one who helped make ISIS. Obama just let them continue.
